title: "We care about balance, and don't ignore broken champs because of skins"
body:
Yet... Diana with a quarter health one shots a Poppy with 90% health despite being stunned on the wall, ulted, hit by multiple Qs, all that. Yeah, Diana is just SUPER fair and balanced. I can see why she's never nerfed!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ONc1ohIw0fc&feature=youtu.be

But remember! Quality and balance before money. That's the code Riot ***LIVES*** by!

replies.body:
[The game in question](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2424650313/228953398)

When this occurred (13:45), the items were as follows:
{{champion:78}} {{item:1001}} {{item:3706}} {{item:1027}} {{item:1029}} {{item:1036}} {{item:1036}}
{{champion:131}} {{item:1001}} {{item:1056}} {{item:1056}} {{item:3001}} 

* You had no health or magic resistance against Diana.  
* You had little in the way of offensive stats (20AD compared to 90AP + Damage Amplification).  
* You fought Diana inside of her own minion wave.
* You were a level below Diana
* Diana had ~100 less health than you did when the fight started

Quite frankly, you picked a horrible fight and were punished for it.
-----------------
Honestly, you would have won that fight if you didn't waste your first Q on the minion wave.

Quite frankly, LITERALLY any other champion would have died. But no, Diana has the base stats of a hyper tank, a free shield for half her health, and clicks on you to do 500 damage instantly when she hits 6.

So is there a reason you wasted your W for when Diana was being CC'd, instead of using it when she could actually retaliate, which would keep her from ulting you twice, which would have won you the 1v1?

You also ignore that the Diana had a level and a significant item advantage. Also, you built wrong. Poppy jungle is garbage shit as a general rule, but cinderhulk at least lets her be tanky. You weren't tanky (Diana actually had more tank stats built than you did), nor did you have nearly as much damage.

You're a bad player Sciela, and you lost to that Diana because you're a bad player. This video proved it, beyond a shadow of a doubt.
She blew the entire damage of her kit on you and you had no MR or HP items and had a level up on you. Its like she has burst and you were squishy, or something.
I mean the skin thing would've been a good argument if she had actually been touched by Riot in the past dozen or so patches, from which I don't recall any changes.

You know what Riot did? they ignored her, despite her being ABSURDLY broken, and even buffed the range on her E (while small, it's a buff).

Remember that Riot has a skeleton of a skeleton crew in every department, and it takes them half a year to make a simple retexture of a model. So, they've known BM Diana was coming, and that's why she's never nerfed.
